isOpen.description: If `true`, the open will be opened.

allowPinchZoom.description: Handle zoom or pinch gestures on iOS devices when scroll locking is enabled.

blockScrollOnMount.description: If `true`, scrolling will be disabled on the `body` when the modal opens.

closeOnEsc.description: If `true`, the modal will close when the `Esc` key is pressed.

closeOnOverlay.description: If `true`, the modal will close when the overlay is clicked.

colorScheme.description: The visual color appearance of the component.

finalFocusRef.description: `ref` of the element to return focus to when `FocusLock` unmounts.

initialFocusRef.description: `ref` of the element to receive focus initially.

lockFocusAcrossFrames.description:
Enables aggressive focus capturing within iframes.
- If `true`: keep focus in the lock, no matter where lock is active.
- If `false`:  allows focus to move outside of iframe.

onClose.description: Callback invoked to close the modal.

onCloseComplete.description: Callback function to run side effects after the modal has closed.

onEsc.description: Callback fired when the escape key is pressed and focus is within modal.

onOverlayClick.description: Callback fired when the overlay is clicked.

restoreFocus.description: If `true`, focus will be restored to the element that triggered the `FocusLock` once it unmounts.

scrollBehavior.description:
Where scroll behavior should originate.

- `inside`: scroll only occurs within the `ModalBody`.
- `outside`: the entire `ModalContent` will scroll within the viewport.

withCloseButton.description: If `true`, display the modal close button.
